Question
========

A person achieves a score of 8.7 good on a Statistics test. The mean score of all participants in the test is 8.1 with a standard deviation 3.1. The z-score of the person with 8.7 good is then equal to

Answerlist
----------

* -1.18
* 0.19
* 1.59

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

-1.18: Incorrect
* 0.19: Correct
* 1.59: Incorrect
